author: Ashish Cardanoscan
title: Testnet Cardanoscan Explorer
description: IOHK dev explorer for testnet does not provide useful insights that developers need. Many developers are asking for a testnet Cardanoscan.
solution: Cardanoscan has lots of developer-friendly insights into the Cardano blockchain. We will make the platform available for the testnet network
experience: We are running the mainnet version of Cardanoscan explorer - the leading Cardano explorer
